items.sentence: I want to go home now, but Tom wants to stay a little longer.
I want Tom to do that, but he told me that he wouldn't do it.
I think that you meant to send this message to somebody else.
We've been cooped up inside all day. Let's go out for a walk.
I don't have to go into the office until 2:30 this afternoon.
When poverty comes in at the door, love flies out the window.
We need to tell our wives that we'll be working late tonight.
My dog goes crazy when she hears the bag of dog food crinkle.
There is little, if any, hope that Tom will win the election.
My problem is that I understand French, but I can't speak it.
